article_title: 5 Things You Should Know About Angel Money In 2014

article_metadata.description: Some of the first money into a young company is that of an angel investor and according to a new poll these maverick financiers have some interesting ideas about what to do in now and in 2014 to reap rewards. Valuation solution company, Worthworm, commissioned polling firm OnePoll to sample 100 [...]
